name: MIBGAS S.A. Mercado Ibérico del Gas
goal:
MIBGAS is the organized gas market operator (Spain and Portugal), responsible for its operational functions, and financial administration of its services, according to the principles of efficiency, transparency and objectivity, non-discrimination and independence.
MIBGAS, as Iberian Gas Market, contributes to the creation of the single energy market, having the European Target Model as frame of reference, similar to those types of gas hubs working in other European countries.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
